clues.text: In 1934 Buffalo Bill's Iowa boyhood home was moved to Cody in this state
The home where Albert Einstein spent his last 20 years is in this state
You can go Polk around the home of this 11th U.S. president in Columbia in this state
A scene in "Shoot the Moon" is set at Jack London's home near this state's Valley of the Moon in Sonoma County
This northerly New England state is where you'll find Robert Peary's summer home, Eagle Island

The Wrigley family owns much of this resort island 22 miles off the coast of Los Angeles
This island, a NYC Borough, is separated from New Jersey by 2 narrow channels: the Kill Van Kull & the Arthur Kill
The western part of this state's panhandle is the high plains, or llano estacado, "staked plains"
This river joins the Columbia near Pasco, Washington, a little more than 1,000 miles from its source in Wyoming

The first woman to have a Nike basketball shoe named for her, she was the WNBA's MVP in 2000 & 2003

rounds.text: You have to go back over a century to find him, the last president who never had a vice president
